data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Dornogovi, Mongolia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dornogovi, Mongolia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Dornogovi, Mongolia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Dornogovi, Mongolia.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Dornogovi to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 460 believers in Dornogovi against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Dariganga people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Dariganga people.
Father, help the 460 believers in Dornogovi to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 52,839 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Dornogovi.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Dornogovi, Mongolia humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

location.name: Dornogovi
location.people_groups_list: Mongol, Khalka, Kalmyk-Oirat, Deaf, Torguud, Buriat, Mongolia
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mongol, Khalka (2,297,000), Kalmyk-Oirat (261,000), Deaf (16,000), Torguud (16,000), Buriat, Mongolia (57,000)
